CommonMagicalItems.Name: Armblade
CommonMagicalItems.Description: An armblade is a unique weapon that can be attached to a character's forearm. It requires attunement and grants the wielder the ability to make melee attacks with it.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Armor of Gleaming
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This armor always appears clean and shiny, requiring no maintenance to keep its pristine appearance. It does not provide any additional protective properties.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Bead of Nourishment
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This small bead can be swallowed as an action, providing nourishment equivalent to a day's worth of food.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Bead of Refreshment
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This small bead can be swallowed as an action, providing refreshment equivalent to a day's worth of water.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Boots of False Tracks
CommonMagicalItems.Description: While wearing these boots, you can choose to leave tracks that mislead pursuers, making it difficult to follow your true trail.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Bottle of Boundless Coffee
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This magical bottle produces an endless supply of hot, aromatic coffee. It can fill a small cup each time it is uncorked.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Breathing Bubble
CommonMagicalItems.Description: When activated, this bubble allows its wearer to breathe underwater or in other hostile environments for up to 1 hour.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Candle of the Deep
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This enchanted candle burns brightly even underwater or in other submerged conditions.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Cast-Off Armor
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This armor can be removed with a single command word, allowing the wearer to doff it quickly.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Charlatan's Die
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This six-sided die can be rolled to determine the outcome of deceptions. When attuned, you can influence the result of the roll.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Cleansing Stone
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This stone can purify food and water, removing toxins and contaminants.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Cloak of Billowing
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This cloak billows dramatically even in the absence of wind, providing no functional advantage.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Cloak of Many Fashions
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This cloak can change its appearance at will, allowing the wearer to alter its color and style.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Clockwork Amulet
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This amulet contains a tiny clockwork device that can produce a ticking sound when activated.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Clothes of Mending
CommonMagicalItems.Description: These magical clothes automatically repair themselves, removing minor damage and stains.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Coin of Delving
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This enchanted coin reveals the presence of hidden or concealed compartments in objects or structures.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Cuddly Strixhaven Mascot
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This plush mascot from Strixhaven University is irresistibly cuddly and comforting.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Dark Shard Amulet
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This amulet is made from a dark shard and grants the wearer darkvision when attuned.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Dread Helm
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This menacing helmet can produce a haunting whispering sound when worn.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Ear Horn of Hearing
CommonMagicalItems.Description: When used, this horn increases the user's hearing range, allowing them to detect faint sounds more easily.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Earring of Message
CommonMagicalItems.Description: Two creatures each wearing one of these earrings can communicate telepathically with each other over a limited distance.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Enduring Spellbook
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This spellbook is immune to fire, water, and other environmental hazards.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Ersatz Eye
CommonMagicalItems.Description: When attuned, this false eye provides vision and can be used to see through illusions.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Everbright Lantern
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This lantern produces a bright, steady light that is not affected by wind or other conditions.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Feather Token
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This token can transform into a feather when activated.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Glamerweave
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This clothing can change its appearance to resemble any other set of clothing.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Hat of Vermin
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This hat can produce harmless vermin like insects and rodents, which crawl out from under it.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Hat of Wizardry
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This hat grants the wearer the ability to cast one cantrip while attuned.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Heward's Handy Spice Pouch
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This magical pouch always contains a wide variety of fresh spices, enhancing the flavor of meals.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Horn of Silent Alarm
CommonMagicalItems.Description: When blown, this horn emits a sound that can alert others silently.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Illuminator's Tattoo
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This tattoo can be attuned to and used to cast the light spell at will.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Imbued Wood Focus
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This focus is carved from special wood and grants a bonus to spell attacks when used by spellcasters.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Instrument of Illusions
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This musical instrument allows the attuned user to create minor visual illusions when played.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Instrument of Scribing
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This musical instrument allows the attuned user to transcribe spells into a spellbook.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Keycharm
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This charm can be attuned to and used to open locks more easily.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Lantern of Tracking
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This lantern can reveal faint tracks or signs of passage when its light is focused on the ground.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Lock of Trickery
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This lock can be difficult to pick and may mislead thieves.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Masque Charm
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This charm grants the wearer a beautiful, featureless mask that can be used to disguise their face.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Masquerade Tattoo
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This magical tattoo grants the wearer the ability to cast disguise self while attuned.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Medal of Muscle
CommonMagicalItems.Description: Wearing this medal grants advantage on Strength checks.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Conch
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This medal allows the wearer to breathe underwater and communicate with aquatic creatures.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Horizonback
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This medal enhances the wearer's land speed and grants the ability to cast longstrider once per day.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Maze
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This medal provides guidance in labyrinthine environments and allows the wearer to cast find the path once per day.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Meat Pie
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This medal grants advantage on Charisma checks when negotiating for food or hospitality.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Wetlands
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This medal allows the wearer to traverse marshy terrain with ease and grants the ability to cast water walk once per day.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Medal of Wit
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This medal grants advantage on Intelligence checks.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Moodmark Paint
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This paint can be applied to change the color of objects or creatures, affecting their mood and demeanor.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Moon-Touched Sword
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This sword emits a dim light in a 15-foot radius, similar to moonlight, when drawn.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Mystery Key
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This key can open a mysterious lock, but the nature of the lock and what lies behind it is unknown.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Orb of Direction
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This crystal orb can reveal the cardinal directions and help the user navigate.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Orb of Shielding
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This orb grants the wearer resistance to force damage while attuned.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Orb of Time
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This glass orb can provide an estimate of the current time and date.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Perfume of Bewitching
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This perfume can be used to enhance the user's Charisma-based checks when interacting with others.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Pipe of Remembrance
CommonMagicalItems.Description: When smoked, this pipe can evoke pleasant memories and grant the user advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Pipe of Smoke Monsters
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This pipe can create illusions of smoke monsters when smoked.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Pole of Angling
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This telescoping pole can be used for fishing and extends up to 10 feet in length.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Pole of Collapsing
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This pole can be collapsed into a tiny form, making it easy to carry and conceal.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Pot of Awakening
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This magical pot can awaken plants placed inside it.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Potion of Climbing
CommonMagicalItems.Description: When consumed, this potion grants the ability to climb surfaces for an hour without making checks.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Potion of Healing
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This common potion can be consumed to restore a small amount of hit points.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Pressure Capsule
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This capsule can withstand extreme pressure and provides air to the user when submerged.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Prosthetic Limb
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This prosthetic limb can be attached to replace a missing limb, granting mobility and functionality.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Rope of Mending
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This magical rope can mend itself when damaged, restoring its integrity.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Ruby of the War Mage
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This ruby can be affixed to a weapon and allows the wielder to use it as a spellcasting focus while attuned.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Scribe's Pen
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This pen can be attuned to and grants advantage on Intelligence (History) checks when used for scribing.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Sekolahian Worshipping Statuette
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This statuette represents the worship of Sekolah, the Sea Mother.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Shield of Expression
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This shield displays various expressions and emotive faces, allowing the user to express themselves nonverbally.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Shiftweave
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This magical clothing can change its appearance and style to match the wearer's desires.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Smoldering Armor
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This armor emits a faint, smoky haze when worn.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Spell Scroll
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This scroll contains a single spell that can be cast when read.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Spellshard
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This shard can store a spell and be used to cast it later.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Spellwrought Tattoo
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This magical tattoo grants the wearer the ability to cast a specific spell once per day.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Staff of Adornment
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This staff can create simple decorative effects, such as flower blossoms or falling leaves.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Staff of Birdcalls
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This staff can mimic the sounds of various birds, allowing the user to communicate or create distractions.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Staff of Flowers
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This staff can create flowers and floral arrangements when used.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Strixhaven Pennant
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This pennant displays the colors and emblem of Strixhaven University.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Talking Doll
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This doll can be attuned to and used to send and receive messages through ventriloquism.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Tankard of Sobriety
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This tankard prevents its user from becoming intoxicated while drinking from it.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Thermal Cube
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This cube can maintain a consistent temperature, keeping its contents hot or cold as desired.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Unbreakable Arrow
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This arrow is unbreakable and can be reused indefinitely.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Veteran's Cane
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This cane signifies a veteran's status and grants advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks when dealing with veterans.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Vox Seeker
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This small device allows the user to send and receive messages over great distances, using vocal messages.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Walloping Ammunition
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This ammunition can deal additional bludgeoning damage on a successful hit.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Wand of Conducting
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This wand can be used to direct lightning, creating harmless displays of electrical energy.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Wand of Pyrotechnics
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This wand can create dazzling pyrotechnic displays when activated.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Wand of Scowls
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This wand produces illusory scowling faces when used.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Wand of Smiles
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This wand produces illusory smiling faces when used.

CommonMagicalItems.Name: Wand Sheath
CommonMagicalItems.Description: This sheath can be attuned to and used to draw and sheathe wands as a free action.
